sentences.en: A syrupy acid obtained by oxidation of glycerol or glyceraldehyde .
sentences.cn: 一种浆状的酸，由甘油和甘油醛氧化后获得。

sentences.en: A widely used durable synthetic resin derived from glycerol and phthalic anhydride.
sentences.cn: 醇''.'酸'.''树脂从丙三醇和酞''.'酸'.''''.'酐'. ''中提炼出的一种应用范围很广的耐用合成树脂.

sentences.en: Acylglycerol ( glyceride ) An ester of glycerol and one or more fatty acids.
sentences.cn: 酰基甘油:一种甘油酯或者一种或几种脂肪酸.

sentences.en: Fish Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 鱼类明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Titanium dioxide, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 二氧化钛, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: Glycerol is a constituent of all fats and phospholipids.
sentences.cn: 甘油是所有脂肪和磷脂的组成部分.

sentences.en: I convert the crisp fat in Joe's breakfast bacon into fatty acids and glycerol.
sentences.cn: 我把乔早餐吃的熏肉中的脆肥肉转变成脂肪酸和甘油.

sentences.en: Ingredients: olive extract, moisturizing factor, rrimethylglycine, glycerol, propylene glycol, silicone.
sentences.cn: 成分: 橄榄提取液, 保湿因子, 三甲基甘氨酸, 甘油, 丙二醇, 硅酮.

sentences.en: Ingredients: Rose extract, whitening factor, moisturizing factor, rrimethylglycine, glycerol, propylene glycol.

sentences.en: Ingredients: Rose extract, whitening factor, rrimethylglycine, glycerol, propylene glycol, silicone.

sentences.en: It might sound weird, but glycerol and water make great analogs for the exploding cloud of supernova matter!
sentences.cn: 这听起来可能很奇怪，但甘油和水是超新星物质爆发云团的极好的近似物。

sentences.en: Kinetic behavior of condensation reaction of acetone and glycerol was experimentally studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了甘油丙酮缩合反应过程的动力学性质.

sentences.en: Microbial production of glycerol have various characters in production raw, mechanism recovery.
sentences.cn: 微生物合成丙三醇在生产原料 、 生产机制、提取方面各具特点.

sentences.en: Objective To study the mechanism of glycerol in treatment of trigeminal neuralgia.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甘油注射阻滞术治疗三叉神经痛的机制.

sentences.en: The glycerol is converted into dihydroxyacetone phosphate which enters glycolysis.
sentences.cn: 甘油可转化为二羟丙酮磷酸,并进入糖酵解.

sentences.en: The worldwide production processes of epoxy chloropropane from glycerol are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了国内外甘油法环氧氯丙烷生产技术.

sentences.en: We split a fat into glycerol and fatty acids.
sentences.cn: 我们把脂肪分解为甘油和脂肪酸.

trans.tran_en: a colourless or pale yellow odourless sweet-tasting syrupy liquid; 1,2,3-propanetriol: a by-product of soap manufacture, used as a solvent, antifreeze, plasticizer, and sweetener (E422)
